long_description: This brightly colored, ergonomic Metolius chalk bag holds chalk on your belt for secure, easy access. Rounded ergonomic cut--fits the whole hand allowing complete chalk coverage; fleece lining retains chalk for good coverage. Stiff, easy access rim keeps bag wide open during use--no-spill drawstring keeps chalk in the bag when stowed. Toothbrush holder allows quick-draw access for cleaning holds. Easy-clip belt included with each Metolius chalk bag. Comes in assorted colors only; sorry, specific color requests cannot be accommodated.
short_description: This brightly colored, ergonomic Metolius chalk bag holds chalk on your belt for secure, easy access.
